templates.name: SaaS Pricing Page
templates.description: Professional pricing page for SaaS products
templates.html:
Choose Your Plan

Start free, upgrade as you grow

Starter

$0/mo
  • Up to 1,000 users
  • Basic analytics
  • Email support
  • Community access
Most Popular

Professional

$29/mo
  • Up to 10,000 users
  • Advanced analytics

Enterprise

$99/mo
  • Unlimited users
  • Custom analytics

templates.name: Retention Focused Page

templates.html:
Don't Leave Yet!

templates.css: .retention-hero{background:linear-gradient(135deg,#f59e0b 0%,#d97706 100%);color:white;padding:80px 0;text-align:center;position:relative;overflow:hidden}.retention-hero:before{content:'';position:absolute;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;background:url('data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100"><circle cx="20" cy="20" r="2" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.1)"/><circle cx="80" cy="40" r="1.5" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.1)"/><circle cx="40" cy="80" r="1" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.1)"/></svg>') repeat;animation:float 20s infinite linear}.container{max-width:1200px;margin:0 auto;padding:0 20px;position:relative;z-index:2}.hero-title{font-size:3.5rem;font-weight:800;margin-bottom:20px;line-height:1.2}.hero-subtitle{font-size:1.25rem;margin-bottom:30px;opacity:0.9}.offer-badge{display:inline-block;background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);padding:10px 20px;border-radius:25px;border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3)}.offer-text{font-weight:600;font-size:1.1rem}.retention-offer{padding:100px 0;background:#f8fafc}.offer-card{background:white;border-radius:25px;padding:60px 40px;box-shadow:0 20px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);text-align:center;max-width:800px;margin:0 auto;border:3px solid #f59e0b}.offer-header{margin-bottom:40px}.offer-title{font-size:2.5rem;font-weight:800;color:#1f2937;margin-bottom:20px}.offer-description{font-size:1.2rem;color:#6b7280;line-height:1.6}.offer-details{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 2fr;gap:40px;align-items:center;margin-bottom:40px}.discount{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;width:150px;height:150px;background:linear-gradient(45deg,#f59e0b,#d97706);border-radius:50%;color:white;margin:0 auto}.discount-amount{font-size:3rem;font-weight:800;line-height:1}.discount-text{font-size:1.2rem;font-weight:600}.offer-features{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:20px}.feature-item{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:15px;font-size:1.1rem;color:#4b5563}.feature-icon{font-size:1.5rem}.offer-cta{display:flex;gap:20px;justify-content:center;flex-wrap:wrap}.accept-offer,.decline-offer{padding:18px 36px;border-radius:50px;font-weight:600;font-size:1.1rem;border:none;cursor:pointer;transition:all 0.3s ease}.accept-offer{background:linear-gradient(45deg,#10b981,#059669);color:white;box-shadow:0 10px 30px rgba(16,185,129,0.3)}.accept-offer:hover{transform:translateY(-3px);box-shadow:0 15px 40px rgba(16,185,129,0.4)}.decline-offer{background:transparent;color:#6b7280;border:2px solid #e5e7eb}.decline-offer:hover{background:#f3f4f6}.testimonials{padding:80px 0;background:white}.section-title{text-align:center;font-size:2.5rem;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:60px;color:#1f2937}.testimonials-grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(400px,1fr));gap:40px}.testimonial{background:#f8fafc;padding:40px;border-radius:20px;border-left:5px solid #f59e0b}.testimonial blockquote{font-size:1.2rem;line-height:1.6;color:#1f2937;margin:0 0 20px 0;font-style:italic}.testimonial cite{color:#6b7280;font-weight:600}@keyframes float{0%{transform:translateY(0px)}100%{transform:translateY(-100px)}}@media(max-width:768px){.hero-title{font-size:2.5rem}.offer-details{grid-template-columns:1fr;gap:30px}.offer-cta{flex-direction:column;align-items:center}.testimonials-grid{grid-template-columns:1fr}}
